pain_points: Can't save money despite high income

script_type: Type B: The Story / The Warning

scenes.narration_text: Meet Aさん, a high-earner who thought keeping his parents' house was a wise decision. But his dream quickly turned into a nightmare.
scenes.visual_prompt: No text, no UI, no subtitles. Cinematic shot of a luxurious modern home, slowly panning to reveal a 'For Sale' sign on the lawn.

scenes.narration_text: With rising interest rates, the property slipped into the red. Mr. A couldn't sell it, as it was worth less than the remaining mortgage. Trapped in a financial nightmare, he faced the prospect of losing everything.
scenes.visual_prompt: No text, no UI, no subtitles. Time-lapse footage of the house deteriorating, with weeds growing and the 'For Sale' sign becoming weathered.

scenes.narration_text: Mr. A realized his mistake too late. He should have consulted a professional asset management firm instead of blindly trusting the real estate agent. Now, he wishes he had made the tough but wise decision to sell the property earlier.
scenes.visual_prompt: No text, no UI, no subtitles. Slow-motion shot of Mr. A contemplating financial documents, intercut with shots of him meeting with a suited financial advisor.

scenes.narration_text: Don't let your inherited property become a financial burden. Get a second opinion on your situation before it's too late. Reach out to us for a free consultation - we'll help you find the optimal solution to protect your assets and family.
